SENT.plain: Idiopathic thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP) is frequently complicated by microinfarcts in cerebral cortex and subcortical white matter
We describe two sisters who suffered massive hemispheric infarction due to thrombosis of the middle cerebral artery main stem during exacerbations of TTP
Acute TTP may be associated with intraluminal thrombosis of large-diameter arteries in addition to arterioles and capillaries
